About Anne Klein Watches

The Anne Klein woman is multifaceted, sophisticated, and above all real. Driven by confidence, honesty, and adventure, her devotion to design and quality is reflected in her everyday essentials. From Anne Klein, this woman expects a consistent fit, good quality, and something she can move and feel comfortable in. She wants to feel timeless yet modern, sensual yet bold, and unconstrained by seasonality.

Developed by Timex in the early 90s, our INDIGLO night-light allows wearers to tell time in the dark with the push of a button.


Timeless Design

For 40 years and counting, the Timex Easy Reader has been a fan favorite. The iconic simplicity of the collection is exactly what a watch should be: a well-crafted and sensible timepiece.

Timex Easy Reader




Easy-to-Read Dial

Attention to Detail & Quality

When it comes to a well-made watch, every detail matters. The all-metal case and mineral glass lens offer strength and durability.

Indiglo

Our revolutionary Indiglo backlight technology changed how the world told time in the dark.

Ultra-soft material- Crafted in soft, breathable, stretchy fabric, IUGA tennis dress provides maximum soft touch& feel. These tennis dresses gently hug every curve of your body with slight tummy control. The moisture-wicking fabric keeps you cool in a workout and daily wear.
Customize your fit- The women dress is designed with adjustable straps that accommodate a wide range of body shapes. Also, it features a built-in bra equipped with removable pads for the support you need.
Built-in shorts- The IUGA workout dress is a lightweight and stretchy A-line mini dress with shorts underneath for coverage. Flat seams keep the shorts feeling smooth against your skin with two side pockets for holding a tennis ball and your phone.

IUGA Summer Dresses for Women 2022

When considering the workout gear, you would most likely come up with leggings and sports bras. This season, however, it‚Äôs all about the workout dress. What makes the IUGA Women dresses worth your money is not just its remarkable features but also its fantastic look.

Adjustable Straps for Your Personalized Fit

The tennis dress features adjustable straps and a stylish X-back design.

Built-in Shorts Liner

There’s a built-in romper liner that ensures you can move in any way you like.

2 Side Pockets

Built-in shorts with 2 side pockets that are big enough to comfortably fit a smartphone.

Removable Pads

Tennis dress featuring built-in bras is equipped with removable pads for the support you need.

Read more

The slimmer-fitted cut curves provide you with a modern and elegant look. The anti-wrinkle fabric and the 4-way stretch quality ensure the enhanced movement of your body while working out. Furthermore, moisture-wicking features keep the sweat and heat away from your body and keep it cool and fresh.

Whether you‚Äôre playing a round of golf or making a quick run to the grocery store, you‚Äôll look super stylish in this stretchy exercise dress. Wear it solo or layer under a jacket with sneakers for a streetwear look.

At IUGA, we believe Yoga is a practice that encompasses all aspects of life, not just the physical, but also includes philosophy, breath and spirituality. It‚Äôs not just about who has the best body or who could do the most advanced poses, but it‚Äôs also about living life in a certain way. Ultimately, it is all about the way you approach your life and the world around you.
